name: Eligos
content:
Eligos

The Winged Rider

Source Inner Sea Gods pg. 326
Pathfinder Wiki Eligos

Details

Alignment LE
Pantheon Infernal Dukes
Areas of Concern Flight, soldiers, watchfulness
Domains Air, Evil, Law, Travel
Subdomains Devil (Evil), Devil (Law), Exploration, Tyranny, Wind
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Lance
Symbol Skeletal winged horse
Sacred Animal(s) Horse
Sacred Color(s) Black, white

Obedience

Ride your mount at top speed in a circuitous route you repeat three times while scattering bones behind you. Gain a +4 profane bonus on saving throws against spells with the ruse descriptor.

Boons - Infernal Dukes

Source Book of the Damned pg. 116
The Lords of Hell, the Dukes of Perdition, and the Princes of Damnation are all names for the infamous nobility of the Pit- the elite caste of devilkind known as the infernal dukes.

All infernal dukes are lawful evil and range in power from CR 26 to CR 27. The boons they grant are less complex than those granted by archdevils, manifesting as spell-like abilities usable once per day each.

1: fly
2: greater arcane sight
3: winds of vengeance

For Followers of Eligos

Feats

Hellish Shackles
